AkCommSettings::Ports

Detailed Description

Ports used for communication between the Wwise authoring application and your game. All of these ports are opened in the game when Wwise communication is enabled. When using HIO type communication, the ports are in fact channels and they must be 3 consecutives channels in the order they are defined in the Port structure.

See also:
  • initialization_comm_ports
  • AK::Comm::GetDefaultInitSettings()
  • AK::Comm::Init()
